title: MDX Components Showcase
description: A showcase of all available MDX components in the blog
author: Patrick Prunty

body.raw:
# MDX Components Showcase

This post demonstrates various custom MDX components available in this blog.

## Headings

# Heading 1
## Heading 2
### Heading 3
#### Heading 4

## Text Elements

This is a paragraph component. You can use [links](https://example.com) as well.

Here's some **bold text** and *italic text*.

## Lists

### Unordered List
- Unordered list item 1
- Unordered list item 2
- Nested item
  - Sub-item 1
  - Sub-item 2

### Ordered List
1. Ordered list item 1
2. Ordered list item 2
3. Another item

## Quotes

> This is a blockquote component. It can be used to highlight important information or quotes from other sources.

## Code

Inline code: `const hello = "world";`

Code block:
```javascript
function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}

console.log(greet("World"));
```

## Tables

| Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 |
|----------|----------|----------|
| Cell 1   | Cell 2   | Cell 3   |
| Data A   | Data B   | Data C   |

## Horizontal Rule

---

## Admonitions

<Admonition type="info" title="Information">
This is an info admonition that provides helpful information.
</Admonition>

<Admonition type="warning" title="Warning">
This is a warning admonition for important notices.
</Admonition>

## Custom Components

<YouTube id="dQw4w9WgXcQ" />

That's a wrap! These are the main MDX components available in this blog.
